website_summaries.verdict: This hand-blown crystal decanter with a distinct, beveled top offers beauty and ease of use. Bottom bell holds a full 750 milliliter bottle of wine at the proper level for perfect aeration. Lighter weight than some other models, which can be helpful if you have trouble lifting and controlling heavy glass decanters.
pros: The 8.5-inch bottom is among the widest of the decanters we considered, optimizing aeration of your wine
Dries faster than some other models
cons: Angled top may make drying a challenge
Some models arrive with chips or imperfections in the glass, though they are replaced under the warranty

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased or seen other fancy wine decanters. Universally the greater the glassblowing artistry, the harder it is to clean them. These are so straightforward to clean and so functional at such a good price I wrote this review. I normally do not write any reviews. Others in our wine group were very interested in the aeration designed for a 750 ML bottle. The only thing I cannot review is their lifetime warranty. Frankly I hope to never provide a review on this benefit. Love them (bought two) Richard Oertle
customer_reviews.author: Richard O

customer_reviews.title: Product came way earlier than expected and in excellent condition. We LOVE this decanter
customer_reviews.text: Product came way earlier than expected and in excellent condition. We LOVE this decanter! It's extremely elegant and looks amazing on the table! We'll have for years to come! Also loved the idea that this is a small family run business. When possible we always make a point of supporting the small business owner, will absolutely support them again and would love to see what else they have! Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, works well, and kinda fun
customer_reviews.text: Really like this thing and use it for every bottle of red wine, unless I've had a few and forget. I can actually taste an improvement after using it. Easy to use, love to pour in the vino and watch it slosh around. Got the drying stand to go with it. Iid been using an aerator that you hold in one hand over the glass and use the other to pour, but like this a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Buster 65

customer_reviews.title: It Does make A Difference
customer_reviews.text: The decanter was reasonably priced and has an elegant look but most importantly functions beautifully. The design of the decanter offers a maximum surface for the wine and it pours well. My wife has a much better sense of smell than me but I can definitely detect aromas throughout the house after the wine has been decanted.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lutwin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful decanter and a company that truly cares about their customers.
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say the product is perfect. It is designed perfectly for Red Wine and looks beautiful as well. I want to add a comment about the company. I received my package today and also an email from the company, Upper Echelon Products. They wanted to remind me of the lifetime warranty, make sure I was happy with the product and offer an Amazon discount on a second order. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa A. Rampulla

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece and it works fantastically
customer_reviews.text: We have been planning on buying a new decanter for years, since our last one broke. We finally ordered one while we were at a restaurant enjoying some wine and this is the one we chose. It is really so pretty and could be left out for decorative purposes if we didn't have the wild dogs in the house.
customer_reviews.author: N. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it for wine drinkers.  Makes a difference in taste!
customer_reviews.text: I was told that this would make a difference in the taste of red wines. It absolutely does! I have other aerators that do the job but I feel this decanter works best. It's also nice to serve out of when entertaining! This would also make a great gift for a wine enthusiasts.
customer_reviews.author: Brendalynn

customer_reviews.title: Love this Wine Decanter!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this decanter. It is not only beautiful, but it aerates the wine just beautifully. One 750ml fits perfectly into it, with the fill line at the largest area in the bottom. Leave the wine in for at least 30 minutes......it tastes so much better than not using it.....amazing. I also use a bottle top aerator to pour the wine into this. As the wine sits even longer (1-2 hours) it opens up even more. The glass is thick....and it is quite beautiful, like a vase. Recommend washing by hand. Buy a brush to help clean this.....it can be tough to get to the bottom. Highly recommend!.....Cheers!!
customer_reviews.author: G. J. Kleinpell

customer_reviews.title: High quality, low price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The decanter arrived well packaged and in great condition. The quality of the material is well beyond the price I paid so I am very happy with this. Several other reviews commented a difficulty in pouring, but is standard with every decanter ever made. You learn quickly how to pour without making a mess - it's not the decanter! Also, huge credit to the company for outstanding customer service! I highly recommend this decanter!!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary A

customer_reviews.title: Great decanter for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this today after looking at many decanters. It just arrived today and I'm very pleased with it. It arrived well packaged and in perfect condition. I liked the beveled pouring edge and the rim is fairly thick and appears sturdy. It is a very good looking decanter with a very wide base and not too heavy to hold. Appears to be an excellent product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: PGA

customer_reviews.title: and is not easily noticeable like the first one was
customer_reviews.text: I understand this is hand made, but first one came in with a bubble in the middle of the neck where it could be felt as well as seen. We returned the original and re-ordered the same product. The 2nd one has a very tiny bubble in the lower part of the decanter, and is not easily noticeable like the first one was. Again, I understand these are hand blown, and some minor defects will occur. We are very happy with the decanter, and especially the service from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and looks very nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and feels like quality. Doesn't seem as fragile as some other decanters and has nice slanted rim. After washing, I place it upside down on an empty plastic pitcher, it dries much faster this way.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Gives an added touch of elegance to a dinner
customer_reviews.text: This decanter gives a touch of elegance to serving wine. It easily holds a 750 ml bottle, although it should hold more. I haven't tried. I aerate the wine by pouring it between a pitcher and this decanter several times. To get the last of the wine out you will have to have this fully inverted. It's nice and strudy so be sure you have a good grip on it
customer_reviews.author: Tad Alder

customer_reviews.title: I love this decanter
customer_reviews.text: I love this decanter. It is both esthetic and functional. It looks beautiful in pictures but I was even more impressed when I saw it in person. It is very sturdy yet delicate. It aerates wine very nicely and is very easy to clean. I am extremely happy with my purchase of this wonderful product. I was also impressed by the attention I received from the company to make sure I was happy with my purchase. I recommend this decanter to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Liza M. Feliciano Hall, DMD

customer_reviews.title: really good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: really good quality for the price. shape opens up the top surface on a 750ml bottle to breath well. asymmetrical top means you need a drier post for a decanter to air dry it after washing, but i have one so thats not a complaint, makes pouring without spills easier. neck is wide enough to fit most nicer types of wine aerators so you can pour through without having to hold the aerator.
customer_reviews.author: M. Green

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great decanter, especially for the price. Nice quality and pours easily without the dripping some other decanters suffer from. The first decanter I received had an air bubble, which is simply the reality of most blown-glass products. The supplier *proactively* reached out asking if I was satisfied and sent a replacement when I let them know I was a little let down. I was really impressed - I've never had any merchant proactively reach out to me before, as a result I would absolutely buy from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: We have been drinking some high quality winesthat recommend "opening to breathe" before consuming
customer_reviews.text: We have been drinking some high quality winesthat recommend "opening to breathe" before consuming. We have tried just letting the bottle stand open and also an aeration spout. Pouring the whole bottle inot the wine decanter is by far the best way to achieve the aeration. We read many reviews of decanters before ordering this one, and we are very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: David H Reinarz

customer_reviews.title: Great decanter and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking decanter. Wine tests great out of it :) We had an issue with our first one and Le Chateau really stood by their product and made it right. Among the best (if not the best) customer service I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Dzevel

customer_reviews.title: Not Glass!!
customer_reviews.text: The product description specifically says "100% Hand Blown Lead-free Crystal Glass" which it is not. It is a preformed poly plastic! Don't expect glass. I was torn on the rating because it is a nice product looks great and works well. For the price I will just keep it because I need one. But the low rating is for what I believe is a deceptive description.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy D.

customer_reviews.title: Quality item supported by excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: This item was packed inI a fitted in Styrofoam case and would have to been crushed in order to break it. The decanter is well made and of high quality. It also comes with a life time warranty. Two days after receiving it I received an email asking me if the decanter arrived undamaged and if I was satisfied and reminded of the lifetime warranty and the need to register for it. The email contained an attachment with cleaning instructions and care tips. I used it for the first time today and am very happy with it. Based on this experience I would purchase other Upper Echelon products.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa Jim

customer_reviews.title: Who Knew?!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a decanter in which to store my opened red wines, knowing that "breathing" would bring out the flavors and reduce tannins. When reading reviews of others, I was surprised to hear the difference they felt this decanter, above their competitors, would make. Seriously big difference! I now actually taste EACH flavor described on each wine. It's an entirely new wine drinking experience. And the piece is simply beautiful. As well-crafted and sturdy and gorgeous in real life as others promised. Cleaning is a bit tricky, but I also haven't followed all directions given so that score may raise in the future. Thank you all for your comments and leading me to this decanter.
customer_reviews.author: Beth A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I went to a wine boot camp class a few weeks ago and was blown away by the difference decanting does for a wine! The taste difference is astonishing and I had no idea! We were told that we should get a decanter with a wide bottom. I saw this decanter and it was just what I wanted. It's beautiful and works well. LOVE it! I am renovating our kitchen right now and plan on having this be one of the only things left on our countertops. It will look great in our "bar" area.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and does the job well, but cleanup is hard.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the aeration we got for fine wine decanting. However, cleanup is not easy at all. Does not rest easily in a dishwasher rack. You will need a special bottle sponge or brush to clean by hand. We have yet to find an easy way to clean the interior. It’s beautiful and does a very good job, but because of the difficult cleanup we would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody Special

customer_reviews.title: A Red Wine's Best Friend
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a glass decanter for letting some of our better red wines breathe before serving. Didn't want any of the fancy ones that look like it would be a nightmare to clean. When I first got it, I thought it might be cast acrylic, but it's quality had blown crystal. It's perfect for those great red wines. Recommend getting a drying stand and flexible wands for inside cleaning. It's plain, not one of those mathematical inspired stem designs, but elegant and just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Loesch

customer_reviews.title: This is not crystal...
customer_reviews.text: This is not crystal and it is very light and thin. Not as described and I would not recommend it unless you want it just for display.
customer_reviews.author: Script

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in Perfect Condition
customer_reviews.text: I was really worried the decanter would arrive cracked or chipped and I would have to waste time returning it and having it replaced, but to my pleasant surprise the decanter arrived in perfect condition, thanks to the custom shaped styrofoam protection. The decanter looks and feels luxurious. I have not used it yet, but is definitely looking forward to it. For the price, I think it's a very good value product.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Chan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was surprisingly good quality for the money. The glass is not so delicate that I have to worry about breaking it from just a little bump on anything. Which I did with our last decanter, hence I needed a replacement. I would certainly recommend this product, the base is wide enough for ample aeration. We like our wines to sit out and breath for a while for best flavor and this certainly does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chipped upon arrival!
customer_reviews.text: Went to use decanter for first time last night, and noticed a chip on the lip making it unsafe to use. Will be going in the trash. Stay away!
customer_reviews.author: White Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Mold city
customer_reviews.text: Gets moldy after cleaning. Must leave vinegar in the bottom and cover top after use. No brush to clean inside.
customer_reviews.author: Mag R

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful looking
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful looking decanter. Has the largest base space I’ve seen which is good for doing its job. Very nicely made, I’ve bought a second one for myself I liked it so much, but buy that bendable tool so it’s easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: KRC

customer_reviews.title: It works well & looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, gets the job done. I do wish it came with a stopper but whatever. NOTE: buy a decanter cleaner unless you're cool with a good rinse being the washing method.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: This decanter is functional and does its job. Some products provide tactile feedback via handling and touching. My only disappointment is the "feel" and weight of the product. I could have been fooled into thinking it is made from lexan and not crystal. The "crystal" seems cheap and it hardly weighs anything. I would not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Glasser

customer_reviews.title: Great decanter but difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: We bought this and another decanter and did a blind taste test with three different bottles of red wine and each time this one came out on top. I truly feel that the surface area makes a difference. I did deduct one star because it has to be washed right away and is very difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Francisca A.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Assurance Control?
customer_reviews.text: I was looking so forward to my decanter after I read all these 5 star reviews. Unfortunately, there is a glaring crack/fix in the glass around the mouth of the decanter. It looks like the glass was broken and then remelted and fixed. I was not expecting this when unwrapping this otherwise beautiful decanter.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Shape That is at the Same Tome, Functional
customer_reviews.text: I was recently on Italy in the town of Agliè. I had a wonderful meal at a restaurant that used just such a decanter to decant wines. I think it works wonderfully. I decant for 20 minutes or so and pour. Easy to use and clean. I’m sure everyone has experienced some exotic methods for aerating. But this decanter doesn’t interrupt the flow of conversation at the table or end up making a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Regina K. Roman

customer_reviews.title: From blah to Ahhh
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a wine decanter before and am now a believer! (cue Monkee song in your head!) Poured entire bottle of Decoy - the poor man's version of Duckhorn - into the vessel and wa laaaaaa the wine never tasted better! It felt sturdy and looks beautiful on the table.
customer_reviews.author: CathTinFL

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and functions well
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, lets wine breath well, and easy to use to pour glasses of wine. It's no easier or harder to clean than similar decanters. That being said, decanters need to be cleaned periodically.
customer_reviews.author: D. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Works great, allows wine to breath , easy to pour.
customer_reviews.text: Look and functionality are awesome. Used for a dinner party almost immediately. Let’s the wine breath before consumption. I only wish they had a stopper with the product. I found one separately to use that looks great supplementing the look of the decanter.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A. Yates

customer_reviews.title: Makes red wine taste better. Hard to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Makes a noticeable difference with red wine but needs a special brush to clean it properly. For now we just swirl a half paper towel around in some soapy water but you really need a carboy brush or some other special brush to clean it. Otherwise a purple film will gradually build up inside.
customer_reviews.author: Skeeter McGee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice decanter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift so can’t comment to flavor or easy to clean. I did buy the cleaning kit as well with the brushes and stainless steel balls. It is a very pretty decanter and will add class to any bar.
customer_reviews.author: QI

customer_reviews.title: Both my first order & replacement order arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The first decanter I received had a chip on the inside of the rim, right out of the box. And sadly, the replacement decanter I received was chipped on the outside of the rim. Seems like a nice product, however quality control seems to be an issue. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R. Costanzo

customer_reviews.title: Good price point and nice aesthetic!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband for his birthday as he had mentioned wanting one. I was pleasantly surprised how safely it was packaged and how nice it looked in person. Having never owned a wine decanter before we are experimenting with it but is seems good so far! Easy to wash and drying is simple as well with the additional stand I purchased separately. Also, does seem to hold a normal sized wine bottle with ease and still has plenty of room for all that "decanting" magic to happen.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to a table
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully as an decanter. I appreciate the craft and detail that is apparent in this crystal piece. Easy to clean without use of long brushes.
customer_reviews.author: S.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift. we got this for our wedding and use it a bunch! it is study, and beautiful. Really lets the wine breathe. They have a matching ball you can also get with it to use when the wine has breathed enough
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It feels good in the hand
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed! It feels good in the hand, easy to grasp, and looks good on the table. Our guests enjoyed having the wine "get some air," and the wine (and we) profited from it. Decanter was very well packed - always a worry with hand blown glass - and arrived on time. This product is exactly as described and a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Hoag

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my boyfriend, and i was waiting until we used it to write a review. It is amazing! Our first wine decanter couldn’t have been better. Super easy to clean and use as everyone else has said! You won’t regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I'm fussy about wine decanters, wanting the most amount of air to reach the wine, and this decanter does it. It's very well made for the price and gives the right amount of surface to air interaction that you need when decanting a quality red. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bob W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The decanter arrived quickly and appears as advertised. This product is easy to clean, is sturdy, and well made. I can't imagine anyone being less than very satisfied with this decanter.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: A great decanter for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a wine decanter for some time that was elegant and affordable. It appears I foound it with the Le Chateau Wine Decanter.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Wallop

customer_reviews.title: Crystal Clear Glass
customer_reviews.text: Have not used the decanter as of yet, but it was delivered quickly; glass is crystal clear without a blemish; and was packaged very securely upon arrival. Other reviews had concerns about how to properly dry the decanter after washing it: but I found it quite easy to dry by placing it upside down resting on my empty blender (sits perfectly). Thinking of getting another one as a gift :-)
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Cheers!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous. Great service and delivery. Even prettier in person and packaged well. Does great job decanting while looking amazing. You can’t go wrong with this price or product
customer_reviews.author: Katy Emmi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Decanter
customer_reviews.text: It's so much fun to decant a nice bottle of wine to share with friends and this decanter beautiful and functional at a great price point. I gave away 3 of these as gifts before I finally bought one for myself. Just buy it, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Becky763

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Decanter
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful decanter and works great. A bit difficult to clean but if you don't let it sit very long after it has been emptied it rinses out quite nicely. I did order some additional cleaning tools to help with that task. Very pleased with the purchased, well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mzkman

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and Functional Decanter
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking decanter with a modern look and soft curves. Decanted wine perfectly with good aeration. My guests were impressed, and I believe they will be ordering one for them selves. Decanter holder fits perfectly and is great for drying and storing the decanter. le Chateau has delivered what they advertised.
customer_reviews.author: R. Noll

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This wine decanter is very well made. The design is superior for allowing the wine to breathe and it's an easy pour when you're ready. The thing that surprised me is how relatively sturdy it is. Nice quality. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty impressed on how this elevated the taste of my wine. Dont expect miracles but it does help. I just hate the after pour drip and that it didn’t come with a stopper.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Our Purchase
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are fine wine enthusiasts and a decanter purchase was long overdue. We decided on the Le Chateau because of the large base which allows more wine (especially those with tannins) to be exposed to air improving its taste. We've used it twice now and appreciate the lightness of the decanter, though it still looks classy. It would be a great gift for anyone who doesn't own a wine decanter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful decanter that pours nicely.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased one of these a few years ago, and I was very happy to find that they were still available after I dropped mine and broke it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: High quality decanter, other brands break easily
customer_reviews.text: After buying (and breaking) two look-alike but inferior decanters, I am so happy! The knock 9ffs are paper thin and crack easily. Le Chateau is much thicker more durable glass, and it's easy to clean. I recommend the drying/storage rack.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M.

customer_reviews.title: The Decanter works as advertised and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I am a newbie to wine making. I had just made 30 bottles of wine (Merlot) a little over a month ago and was anxious to open a few bottles . I saw some where that a decanter can help with mellowing out young wine by exposing it to air. Without the decanter my young wine was a little harsh. With this decanter , my wine was drinkable after 20 minutes or so. I highly recommend getting this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job beautifully
customer_reviews.text: We like a Spanish Rioja they requires plenty of air. This decanter does the job. The only challenge is to get it dry without spots after washing. My wife keeps it on display because she loves the shape.
customer_reviews.author: Kossum

customer_reviews.title: Well Crafted!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in perfect condition. Received a message from the seller shortly after arrival inquiring about my initial satisfaction with the product, which is a nice touch. The decanter is lightweight and beautifully shaped and easy to pour into. Look forward to many enjoyable glasses of wine.
customer_reviews.author: puckfiction

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Such an elegant decanter! Very well made and I love the fact it is lead free!
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. Castelan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Decanted some recently discovered South Italian wines. Worked like a charm for Nero D’Avola and Aglianico. Also used on Pinot Noir. The oval opening allows an easy pour and all sloped sides allow easy draining.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice decanter
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and finish of this decanter. The pointed spout makes pouring easier than some other models. I'd recommend getting a drying stand as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Van Rees

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The decanter was purchased as a gift. It is beautiful and very elegant. The quality is as good, if not better than higher priced I've seen in stores. This came when expected and packaged to beat the odds of damage during shipping. Very well done. Will definitely order from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A. Duesing

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal product!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is worth ever cent!! I bought it for my mother as a Christmas present. I read on in The NY Times that this is one of the best wine decanters. My mom opened it on Christmas to find a chip on it. I emailed their costumer service, and within three days we received another one. Their costumer service is phenomenal, and the decanter has a lifetime warranty!!
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Daly

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and well made
customer_reviews.text: Excellent decanter. Aerates the wine nicely, with a significant surface area exposed. Well made and attractive. My only (very minor) complaint is that it drips after pouring. Keep a cloth handy to prevent wine drips on your table.
customer_reviews.author: Tom K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Decanter!
customer_reviews.text: The Le Chateau Wine Decanter is very well made. Other decanters I've tried were too thin and would break easily, especially on granite countertops. The Le Chateau decanter is thick, beautifully crafted, and I just love the way it looks with red wine in it!
customer_reviews.author: J.Mc

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece to add to your bar or sit on your table for dinner. We had a bottle of wine that was just so-so and after we decanted the wine for about an hour before dinner - we were pleasantly surprised how much better it tasted! So happy with this purchase and great communication from the company!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful piece of art
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was great. easy to get out but also secured the decanter very well. The intricate detail on the bottom of the decanter is only something you can find on in hand blown glass. The surface area created by the well crafted shape allows for proper and rapid decanting.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Beautifful and funcitonal for wine
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and weight. Good value. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wine decanter
customer_reviews.text: The Le Chateau Wine Decanter is stylish in design and very useful for bringing out the flavours of wine. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Filmprof

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I have not used my new carafe yet. But oh my goodness it is gorgeous! I can hardly wait to use it on Thanksgiving!
customer_reviews.author: Y. Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Being “new” to wine drinking (at 55 yrs young! ...
customer_reviews.text: Being “new” to wine drinking (at 55 yrs young!) we have studied and researched types and tastes. This decanter has literally breathe life in our bedtime down time. We have discovered that is one thing to “drink” and a whole other thing to “TASTE!"
customer_reviews.author: templegrd

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always hesitated when it came to buying a decanter, but I couldn’t be more happier with choosing this one. My husband and I are big wine drinkers and have our “go to” reds. This decanter has so much surface area to truly make a difference after an hour or so of aerating. Don’t think twice if you’re considering this!
customer_reviews.author: S&L Mahler

customer_reviews.title: Great Decanter
customer_reviews.text: All wine lovers should have a decanter. I really didn't know what I was missing until I bought this and let my tuscans and cabs sit for an hour or two before drinking. Really makes a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Thus would make a nice gift for wine lovers
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty and heavy glass decanter. I’ve only used once, but so far I like it. It came quickly and in perfect condition due to excellent packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: High quality and beautiful! Pretty easy to clean but you need to buy the cleaning set seperately.
customer_reviews.author: Hongmei Dou

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but not bad
customer_reviews.text: A few bubbles in the glass but overall it does what it needs to.
customer_reviews.author: DbleAron

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful and functional decanter!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this decanter. It’s perfect for a bottle of red. Our previous decanter chipped and is moving to our lake home, so we ordered this. Saw it was rated as #1 decanter and I’d agree 100%. Beautiful, sturdy and easy to pour with. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cornelison

customer_reviews.title: Excellent decanter
customer_reviews.text: Great pouring decanter and great ratio for letting big, bold cabs open up before drinking. If you can wait to drink the wine once the cork is pulled, this vessel will improve the experience for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great decanter
customer_reviews.text: We bought 4 of these decanters as gifts for a wine group. They are beautiful and the group really liked them. Very sturdy and very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Penn

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works well, pours into a glass with no mess, easily back into the bottle with a funnel
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Weiner

customer_reviews.title: Works good- fits a entire bottle
customer_reviews.text: Works great, simple to clean if you do it right away.
customer_reviews.author: krystal marin

customer_reviews.title: Packaging and shipping were great. Not so sure about the materials for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Update: Feb 2017 - the manufacture did reach out to me and sent me another decanter. The 2nd shipment was significantly better; however, this leads me to believe some of the QC measures are not equal for all shipments - hence the upgrade from 3 to 4 stars and not to 5. Original review: Packaging and shipping were great. Not so sure about the materials for the price point - feels very plastic like
customer_reviews.author: Jee

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: It’s vefy very pretty and very sturdy! My friends all rave about this decanter so I’m very excited and can’t wait to use it. It arrived on second day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning is tuff!
customer_reviews.text: A bit tough to clean - but if you empty it, and quickly rinse with soapy water, and rinse with hot water, and turn upside down, and continue to swirl the water out, it becomes clean enough!! - need to think that bit of it through when deciding to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S.S

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The original wine decanter that was shipped contained a cosmetic flaw. The manufacturer agreed to send a replacement unit (at no cost) and the item was promptly received. The wine decanter works as advertised. Great exposure for the decanting process and wine flows easily from the decanter. Impressed with the service provided.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking decanter
customer_reviews.text: As described. Looks nice and is great for aerating and decanting red wines. Have not really found a good way to clean it though
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: My hubs is in the wine business and he approves of this decanter. He says it softens it nicely. Slightly thin but still great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B

customer_reviews.title: Wine Decanter
customer_reviews.text: Great item, easy to hold, good looking decanter, looks just like the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Brunson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! Definitely on the light weight side
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Definitely on the light weight side. Wish it were heavier. Very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Dynva B. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Durable and beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: Amsolutely amazing! The product is very durable. The base is large and allows for the wine to airrate well. By allowing the wine to breathe well we’re able to have better tasting wine. It is a really beautiful product that look a great onthe table. This company was awesome and will purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: April hays

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, decorative piece.
customer_reviews.text: Works well in aerating the wine. Displays well and has a large spout. Lightweight also!!
customer_reviews.author: John A. Parodi

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than the price
customer_reviews.text: Decanters like this from Riedel cost over $300. This one is just as good and 1/6 of the price. Totally worth it, came in very sturdy packaging in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: grolarbear

customer_reviews.title: An elegant wine decanter...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful decanter that does its job of aerating wine with style. It's very easy to fill and hold for pouring. We are finally able to enjoy our wines to the fullest thanks to Le Chateau.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Foss

customer_reviews.title: Great decanter
customer_reviews.text: Great decanter. easy to pour wine and looks great on the table
customer_reviews.author: joann

customer_reviews.title: I de-can't believe the difference this makes in how wine ...
customer_reviews.text: I de-can't believe the difference this makes in how wine tastes. De-can't imagine not using it now. Try this, you de-won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: MattyJK

customer_reviews.title: Attractive wine decanter
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time yesterday. It was fine, very attractive. Haven't tried to clean it yet so we'll see how easy that is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Le Chateau Wine Decanter - Hand Blown Lead-free Crystal Glass - Red Wine Carafe - Wine Gift - Wine Accessories
feature_bullets: LEAD FREE CRYSTAL - Our hand blown lead-free crystal decanters add radiance to any room or kitchen with a modern yet elegant design. Impress your guests, amplify the ambiance and enhance the purity, aroma, and taste of your favorite red or white wine with our wine pourer. Perfect for a merlot, cabernet, pinot noir, port and other bottles of wine.

PROVIDE YOUR WINE WITH ITS OWN CHATEAU - Free your wine from the grasp of an air restricting bottle by letting it flow into our elegant crystal wine decanter aerator. Decanting the wine from the bottle to the decanter oxygenates the wine and releases its rich aroma and flavor.

PERFECTLY ENGINEERED FOR A STANDARD 750ML BOTTLE - Don't be tricked by other manufacturers claiming their decanter has a volumetric capacity of 1700ml or more. The volume is pointless, what really matters is how much breathable surface area 1 bottle of wine is exposed to in the carafe. When an entire bottle of wine is poured into OUR decanter, the wine reaches the widest diameter on the decanter allowing for maximum aeration. This is a wine accessory you can't live without.

EASY POUR SLANTED SPOUT - Avoid spills and drips with our specially designed large slanted top. If you are a wine drinker, you will appreciate how our 32 ounce / 750ml wine breather enhances the taste.

MAKES THE PERFECT PRESENT - A great present for any "wino". The perfect idea for wine lovers, enthusiasts, women, men, dad, mom, husband, wife, grandparents and more. Surprise your wine connoisseur friends with a unique wine present for holidays, weddings, or birthdays.
